member.name: T:BattleField2.Models.Cells.CellType
member.summary: Enumeration that holds the two basic CellType types. The Empty cell type and the Detonated cell type.

member.name: F:BattleField2.Models.Cells.CellType.Empty
member.summary: Enumeration value representing the Empty cell type.

member.name: F:BattleField2.Models.Cells.CellType.Detonated
member.summary: Enumeration value representing the Detonated cell type.

member.name: T:BattleField2.Models.Cells.Cell
member.summary: The Cell class is an abstract class to be inherited by the concrete Cells

member.name: P:BattleField2.Models.Cells.Cell.StringRepresentation
member.summary: Abstract method to be inherited by the concrete Cells to output their given in-game representations.

member.name: T:BattleField2.Models.Player.HighScore
member.summary: HighScore class handles the procedures involving the storage of the Players scores and their listing.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Models.Player.HighScore.#ctor
member.summary: Method that reads the high score results from file.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Models.Player.HighScore.ListHighScore
member.summary: Method that first sorts the current content of the highScoreList and then creates and formats a StringBuilder object to be returned as a string.
member.returns: Returns a string that represents a list of the top Player results.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Models.Player.HighScore.SaveHighScore(BattleField2.Models.Player.Player)
member.summary: Method that gets the current player score at the end of the game and adds it to the highScoreList.
member.param: Player object that represents the current player.
